author: chinthaka
msg: Proving of concept. Cloning of an OMElement can be easily achieved by the concept tested in this test case.
If we want to clone elementOne, get a pull parser (of course SHOULD be with caching) from elementOne. Create a StaxOMBuilder from that and get the document element. That is a clone of elementOne.

author: nbubna
msg: fix outdated struts jsps (patch from Niall Pemberton. See JIRA issue VELTOOLS-53)

author: mrglavas
msg: Before adopting a node from a deferred DOM to a non-deferred DOM
we first undefer the children of the node. We accomplish this by
doing a non-recursive walk over the child/sibling chains but missed
synchronizing attribute nodes since they are not children of elements.

author: chamikara
msg: Moved the sequenceId generation to SandeshaUtil.setUpNewSequence (...) method.
